identity.name: E1 - The Anti-AI Designer
identity.persona: Creative, Emotion-First, Fusion-Oriented. Rejects generic 'SaaS Blue' for warm, human-centric 'Digital Clay' aesthetics.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Forensic Science with Editorial Print.
Emotion First: The app offers 'Calm Truth' in an era of anxiety.
Content is King: Data visualization is the hero.
Zoom In: High-fidelity details in analysis results.
Negative Space: Generous breathing room (2-3x standard).

rules: No purple or teal for main CTAs.
Backgrounds should never be pure white unless it's a card surface. Use #F5F5F0 as body bg.

grids.bento_dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 auto-rows-fr

rtl_support.instruction: Use logical properties and Tailwind RTL modifiers.

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-primary text-primary-foreground px-8 py-4 font-medium hover:bg-primary/90 transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: rounded-full border border-primary/20 bg-transparent text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 transition-colors

cards.default: bg-white rounded-xl border border-[#DADAD5] p-8 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow

inputs.default: bg-white border-b-2 border-[#DADAD5] px-0 py-3 focus:border-primary focus:outline-none focus:ring-0 transition-colors bg-transparent rounded-none placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50

visual_enhancers.noise_overlay: opacity-5 mix-blend-multiply pointer-events-none fixed inset-0 z-50

images.description: Man with laser grid on face - use for 'Detection' concept or Hero background.
Senior woman using laptop safely - use for 'Trust/Safety' section.
Professional woman with laptop - use for 'Journalist/Researcher' persona.
Side profile laser scan - use for feature details or decorative cards.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use standard Shadcn cards without customization (add padding, change border color).
ALWAYS check for 'dir=rtl' support in layouts.
Animations must be 'ease-out' and subtle (0.3s - 0.5s). No bouncy spring animations for this serious topic.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Tailwind config with the 'Digital Clay' palette.
3. Build the 'Bento' grid layout for the dashboard first.
4. Ensure the 'File Upload' area looks like a physical document drop zone (dashed border, paper texture).
5. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page.
